segments.text: This kitchen drawing catches my eye immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on, and the sink is brimming over with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's disgusting how it's just flooding everywhere unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing right there, drying a plate, clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron might get soaked, and she doesn't even see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading on the floor—sloppy and avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids: boy's climbing on a shaky stool for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching in with one hand, plate in the other—messy business.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting, hand out like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinet doors just inviting more disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside is neat, unlike this interior sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whole scene feels grimy with the water and sneaking around.
segments.speaker: PAR
